data.event: In the past, the name connoted the area stretching from the fifth milestone junction of Upper Serangoon Road and Upper Paya Lebar Road/Boundary Road to the seventh and a half milestone junction of Upper Serangoon Road and Punggol Road.

event.title: was formerly considered part of Punggol but is now

data.event: The area just beyond the seventh milestone along Punggol Road was formerly considered part of Punggol but is now within Hougang Town and that section of Punggol Road is now Hougang Avenue 8, with Punggol Road starting further north.

event.title: was carried out in Punggol, including the area of Punggol that is now

data.event: Pig farming was carried out in Punggol, including the area of Punggol that is now part of Hougang Town.

event.title: Today, Hougang is an HDB new town with over 40,000 housing units interspersed

data.event: Today, Hougang is an HDB new town with over 40,000 housing units interspersed with pockets of private residential areas.
